snippet: The effort to turn a century-old sawdust factory in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, into an acoustically sound concert hall, recording studio, nightclub and center for composers is moving ahead.
abstract: Construction on Original Music Workshop, century-old sawdust factory in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, that is being converted into concert hall, recording studio, nightclub and composers' center, moves ahead after organizers collect $16 million in donations.
lead_paragraph: The effort to turn a century-old sawdust factory in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, into an acoustically sound concert hall, recording studio, nightclub and center for composers is moving ahead.
